#summary How to get more information about Multi Theft Auto

More information about our project can be found at our own wiki: [http://development.mtasa.com].  This primarily includes vast documentation about Lua implementation.

You can also visit the following pages for information about Multi Theft Auto:
* [http://multitheftauto.com]
* [http://forum.multitheftauto.com]

Much of development also is discussed through IRC.  Please refer to the [http://mtasa.com/irc.html IRC] page for more information.
